author: ryanleeschneider
content:
Question about the devnet-6 rpc endpoint: is `eth_sendRawTransaction` routed to a different set of nodes that might be lagging?  I used the faucet to get some ETH and my balance shows as 6ETH but if I try to end 0.05 I get an insufficient balance error:

```
> cast balance 0x4bE0Cd2553356b4ABb8b6a1882325dAbC8d3013D --rpc-url https://rpc.pectra-devnet-6.ethpandaops.io
6000000000000000000

> cast rpc eth_sendRawTransaction 0x02f8768501a588771080843b9ac9ff843b9aca0d82520894b9e79d19f651a941757b35830232e7efc77e1c7987b1a2bc2ec5000080c080a0c3cc40018bf325c3be67074ac26c587da6b2aa587374c25900342fc36cc0d4a1a045f42b24828333ceec86e098fb97e7a5066aef4821d5be5e584622240a4b4adf --rpc-url https://rpc.pectra-devnet-6.ethpandaops.io

Error: server returned an error response: error code -32000: 0x4be0cd2553356b4abb8b6a1882325dabc8d3013d does not have enough balance to cover transaction costs, need 50021000000273000, but have 0 (insufficient balance)

> cast --to-unit 50021000000273000 ether
0.050021000000273000
```
